title: Full-stack application, CloudFront to S3, Lambda to RDS
description: This sample project demonstrates how to create and deploy a serverless full-stack web application.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This project creates and deploys a serverless full-stack application to AWS.
The frontend of the application is deployed as a static website to an AWS S3 bucket and delivered to end users through a CloudFront distribution.
The backed of the application is deployed as an AWS Lambda function. The frontend is accessing the backed through a lambda function URL.
The database of the application is a AWS RDS Postgres instance.
The infrastructure is created through a CDK application which also builds and deploys everything to AWS.
The application will allow end users to take flashcard tests with questions from different categories available in the RDS database created.
